column1: #Text=Azula says : " My , my , you 're easy to find .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Oh , I get it .
#Text=" Suki says : " If you 're looking for the Avatar , you 're out of luck .
#Text=" Mai says : " I knew this was a waste of time .
#Text=Any friend of the Avatar is an enemy of mine !
#Text=" Mai says : " You 're so colorful , it 's making me nauseous .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " You 're not prettier than we are .
